product_name: prAna Marina Triangle Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soak up some summertime sun in the prAna Marina Triangle top. It's a comfortable top whether you're splashing in the shallows or relaxing in the sand after a surf session. With a UPF 50+ rating, polyester/spandex fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Fully lined front body with removable molded cups is flattering without being too revealing. Full flex straps provide great support. Adjustable tie detail in back. prAna Marina Triangle top fits cups A - C best. Closeout.
short_description: Soak up some summertime sun in the prAna Marina Triangle top. It's a comfortable top whether you're splashing in the shallows or relaxing in the sand after a surf session.
